name: Monolith
public_notice: TokenCard rebrands to Monolith to usher self-sovereign finance powered by Ethereum https://medium.com/monolith/tokencard-rebrands-to-monolith-to-usher-self-sovereign-finance-powered-by-ethereum-c85c2a04136d

ico_data.short_desc: A platform for the post-bank era
ico_data.description: TokenCard is a depositless Ethereum token-based debit card & platform.TKN is a special kind of Ethereum token. It is an asset backed token where the underlying assets represent an accumulation of different ERC20 tokens over time. The underlying assets are secured inside the TKN Asset Contract from which TKN holders can redeem their pro-rata share from.
